comments:
Description:
DataException is thrown when using render task to render design files containing table.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Generate report document from attached design file using RunTask.
2. Generate output html file from the report document using RenderTask

Result:
SEVERE: Invalid expression handle
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Invalid expression handle
